descriptions: This 90 m², 2-bedroom apartment on Avenue de la Couronne, Ixelles, has beautiful wooden floors, a living area, and a modern kitchen. The property has been recently renovated and is equipped with central heating.

Apartment with 1 bedroom completely furnished, 40m² with caretaker and cellar for rent on Av. Winston Churchill. The property is located close to the Bois de La Cambre & the commercial center Uccle Bascule. The property includes basement and fireplace. The bedroom includes a double bed.
You will love the modern living room. It has polished hardwood floors, funky grey rugs, and a bold red sofa. There is even a beautiful painting and a unique sculpture, to add some extra flair.
Possibly. Do you want to live in a calm and peaceful apartment in the suburbs? This practical 1-bedroom space is in a residential area close to parks.

The surrounding neighbourhood has good transport links including trams and buses. There is a gym, supermarket and police station all within a 5-10 minute walk. There is also a selection of surrounding restaurants.

The apartment is located on Rue du Trône, in the wealthy neighbourhood of Ixelles, close to public transport, green spaces, supermarkets, shops and restaurants. Bus 95 stops a minute from the apartment and takes you to the Free University of Brussels in just 6 minutes. Brussels's City Centre is located only 30 minutes away on foot, or a short ride away using public transport. Brussel-Luxemburg train station, where you can catch Eurocity, local and intercity trains, is 8 minutes from the apartment.
